SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.structurearchetypes

Interface IPerpetualMover

All Superinterfaces:
IStructure, IStructureConst
All Known Implementing Classes:
Clock, Flag, RevolvingDoor, Windmill
public interface IPerpetualMover extends IStructure
Represents structures that can move perpetually. For example, windmills and flags.
